articles.description: Brittney Griner was seen for the first time since her February arrest in Russia Thursday, appearing in a short clip purportedly posted online from a Moscow courthouse, where she pleaded not guilty to drug charges.
articles.content: Brittney Griner was seen for the first time since her February arrest in Russia Thursday, appearing in a short clip allegedly posted to social media from a Moscow courthouse after the WNBA star's pri… [+15076 chars]

articles.title: Liverpool have 'quirky German' and Manchester United to finish in ninth? - Football365
articles.description: All those trophies won by Jurgen Klopp and he is still just a 'quirky German'.
articles.content:

articles.title: Ian Wright defends Marcus Rashford after Manchester United star's confrontation with fans - Daily Mail
articles.description: Ian Wright has launched an impassioned defence of Marcus Rashford following the Manchester United star's angry reaction to fans. He says Rashford was right to stand up for himself.
